attributes.action: All NHS hospitals to have an Adolescents Oncology wards.
attributes.additional_details: As you can imagine battling cancer at any age is hard but especially at such a young age. Therefore I am proposing that all UK hospitals have an Adolescent oncology wards for young people who need support from loved ones in such tough and challenging times.
attributes.background: I am a 17 year old cancer patient. I was diagnosed with cancer 2 months after my 17th birthday, in the eyes of the law I am a child however in the eyes of the NHS I am an adult. As a result of this I have had to have some treatments on an adult ward which means I can’t have a parent with me.

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about what you've been going through. 

Decisions on the provision of specific facilities such as the provision of wards and the accompanying of patients are a matter for individual NHS trusts and not the UK Government or Parliament.
